name: 45 LP Shirt
description:
Originally $30 - GM First Edition - LIMITED QUANTITIES!!!

In loving memory of Disco Demolition Night, Comiskey Park Chicago - July 12th, 1979.

Disc Jockey, Steve Dahl, asked his listeners to bring their disco records and $0.98 to Chicago’s Comiskey Park (home of the White Sox) so he could blow up the LPs and put an end to disco forever. With Dahl leading the “Disco Sucks” chant, an estimated 90,000 fans and listeners showed up to storm the field and joined him in setting fire to thousands of disco records.

Wanna make a difference? When you order this shirt, we will give 10% of the profits towards The Home Foundation and their efforts to end human trafficking in the United States and the world. There are many woman and girls that are taken against their will and forced to do unspeakable acts. This must stop. Grotto Madrid is committed to doing our part to end human trafficking. Join us!

100% Cotton - Made in the USA - Machine Wash Cold - Hang Dry

Our shirts fit like American Apparel shirts (they run a little small). Ladies, make sure to order a smaller size than you wear in woman's sizes.

name: Lips
description:
GM First Edition - LIMITED QUANTITIES!!!

Joyce Samuels of Louisville, Kentucky is the current Guinness World Record Holder for blowing the largest bubblegum bubble from the nose, 16 in(40.64 cm). At the time this was written, Samuels is the only person to ever hold this record. . . Listen kids, stick to blowing bubbles from your lips.
